word:
Following Up With Health Education.--Captain Press and his wife, the president of the W.C.T.U. of Victoria, were 
                                                                           263
present. Mrs. Press had visited me at my tent on the campground, and she was urgent that I should speak to their society. After the discourse on Sunday she came to me and, grasping my hand, said, "I thank you for that discourse. I see many new points which have made a lasting impression upon my mind. I shall never lose their force."
